title: Pesto Grilled Cheese Sandwich
method: Step 1: Spread butter on one side of a slice of bread and place it, buttered side down, into a nonstick skillet over medium heat.
Step 2: Spread 1/2 of the pesto sauce on the unbuttered side of the bread. Stack provolone cheese, tomato, and American cheese on top of pesto, in that order.
Step 3: Spread remaining pesto sauce on second slice of bread. Place it pesto side down onto sandwich in the pan. Butter the top side of bread.
Step 4: Gently fry sandwich, flipping once, until both sides are golden brown and cheese has melted, about 5 minutes per side.
